sentences.en: A driver has a good sense / bump of locality.
sentences.cn: 司机对于方位有很强的辨识力.

sentences.en: A driver has a good sense of locality.
sentences.cn: 司机对于方位有很强的辨识力。

sentences.en: Details of the drinking water quality in your locality can be obtained from the public register.
sentences.cn: 有关当地饮用水质量的详情，可从公共登记册上获知。

sentences.en: He knows the terrain of this locality like the back of his hand.
sentences.cn: 他对这一带的地形了如指掌.

sentences.en: He surprised us with his knowledge of the locality.
sentences.cn: 我们很惊讶他对那地方如此了解.

sentences.en: Host specialization of strains is present in one geographical locality.
sentences.cn: 在某一地理场所菌系具有寄生主的专化性.

sentences.en: It was the locality of the crime.
people living in the locality of the power station
sentences.cn: 居住在发电站周围地区的人

sentences.en: Some factories in this locality still discharge waste water into the river.
sentences.cn: 这一地区有些工厂仍把废水排入河中.

sentences.en: That locality was outside the range of fighter support.
sentences.cn: 但其位置远在战斗机支援航程以外.

sentences.en: The locality appeared to be less private than I had expected.
sentences.cn: 地点不象我预期的那么僻静.

sentences.en: The new houses in this locality have very high ceilings.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的新房子天花板甚高.

sentences.en: The two factories are in the same locality.
sentences.cn: 这两家工厂在同一地区.

sentences.en: There was a famine of water in this locality.
This is the biggest hospital in the locality. It has 700 beds.
sentences.cn: 这是本地最大的医院,该医院有七百张病床.

sentences.en: weather reports from several different localities
sentences.cn: 来自几个不同地区的天气报告

words.tran_cn: 当地的；局部的；地方性的；乡土的
局部的；地区的；小范围的
[计] 局部；当地居民；本地新闻
有地方色彩，地方主义；方言
定位信标；[计] 定位器（等于localiser）
位置（形容词locational）；地点；外景拍摄场地
使地方化；定位；局限（localise的过去分词）
找出；安置；确定…的位置（locate的ing形式）
使地方化；使局部化；停留在一地方

trans.tran_en: a small area of a country, city etc
